sentences: Magus on mind. (The cat is cute.)
See magus tüdruks tõi mulle sörkimise kriisini. (That cute girl brought me to tears of laughter.)
Mida teeme nüüd? Magus mäng. (What do we do now? A cute game.)
context: 'Magus' is commonly used to describe something or someone that is perceived as adorable, pleasant to look at, or endearing in a way that evokes positive emotions.
